backend/main.mo: Defines core actor logic, role types, data models, and storage maps for users, applications, announcements, homework, routines, and lock states with authorization helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence items referencing frontend files, components, and tests for admin fixes, application visibility, and approval pipeline reliability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing their purposes, behaviors, and UI features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode tokens, and base styling for backgrounds, text, borders, and UI elements.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app from src/main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, authentication guards, error boundaries, and layout rendering based on session roles.
frontend/src/auth/AuthContext.tsx: Provides global authentication context, session persistence, login/logout logic, and cache invalidation for admin sessions.
frontend/src/auth/session.ts: Utility for saving, loading, and clearing session data in localStorage with typed roles.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Main layout component providing navigation, header, footer, and responsive drawer for authenticated users with admin links and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthFormFie: Reusable styled form field with label, input, icons, validation error display, and disabled handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthPrimary: Gradient-styled primary auth button with loading state and variant support.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthScreenL: Layout wrapper for authentication screens with decorative background and configurable max width.
frontend/src/components/LockIndicator.ts: Displays a lock or unlock icon with a tooltip, indicating locked state of a section.
frontend/src/components/RuntimeErrorBoun: Error boundary that catches runtime errors and renders a fallback UI with reset capability.
frontend/src/components/RuntimeErrorFall: Fallback screen shown on errors with optional error details in development and a reload button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, status tracking, and client creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocks.ts: Provides lock state queries and mutations for master, section, and item-level content locks using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for student login, applications, student management, announcements, homework, routines, and class times.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, color themes, animations, and custom utility classes for the UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard showing applications, students, content sections, and lock controls with mutation handlers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Simple admin login screen validating a hardcoded password and redirecting to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/ClassRoutinePage.tsx: Displays the latest weekly class routine with lock indicators and a table layout.
frontend/src/pages/ClassTimeSchedulePage: Allows viewing and managing class time schedules with add, edit, delete, and lock-aware controls.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays welcome header, quick-access cards, admin tools, and previews of notices and routines with lock status checks.
frontend/src/pages/HomeworkPage.tsx: Manages homework listing, creation, editing, and deletion with item and section lock enforcement.
frontend/src/pages/NoticesPage.tsx: Provides CRUD management for announcements with per-item and section-level locking.
frontend/src/pages/PendingApprovalPage.t: Shows a pending-approval message for users awaiting admin confirmation with logout navigation.
frontend/src/pages/RoleSelectPage.tsx: Presents role selection cards for student, visitor, and admin navigation.
frontend/src/pages/StudentApplyPage.tsx: Handles student application form submission and displays confirmation screen after applying.
frontend/src/pages/StudentLoginPage.tsx: Handles student login using username/password, processes backend role responses, and navigates users based on approval status.
frontend/src/pages/VisitorLoginPage.tsx: Provides a simple visitor login using a fixed password and togglable password visibility before routing to the home page.
frontend/src/utils/adminErrors.ts: Utility functions that extract human-readable error messages and detect authorization-related errors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the projectâ€™s current state, goals, issues, and existing features for the school website system.
